english.segment1: Through the noise of the street. And the screams inside my head. I don't seem to find peace. Through the words that you have said
english.segment2: The traffic's constant pulse through the rush of pouring rain. Make me crave for a moment. When I can hear you speak again
english.segment3: Running round like I need to break free. Come to me like I need you to be
english.segment4: I can't hear you. No matter how hard I try. I can't hear you. I know that you'll hear my cry
english.segment5: Longing for the hush. That escapes me every day. Need to break through it all. But there seems no easy way
english.segment6: Fortress all around me. Sound walls moving in. Desperate just to you hear you. Through an ever increasing din
